level.heading: EMERGENCY MEDICAL SERVICES AGENCY VEHICLES[COLON] INSPECTIONS (§ 29-513)

level.text: 513.1 Each Emergency Medical Services Agency’s vehicle, its equipment, allssociated records, and the premises designated in its application, shall bevailable for inspection by the District EMS Officer or his or her designeeuring the usual hours of operation.
513.2 The Director may subject any emergency medical response vehicle certifiednder this chapter to an unscheduled inspection to determine compliance withertification standards.

513.3 An emergency medical response vehicle certification issued under thishapter shall be valid for one (1) year; provided that the Emergency Medicalervices Agency maintains a valid District certification.
